content.rendered:
Directed by A.C. Mughil

Written by A.C. Mughil

Star Prabhu Deva (Pon Manickavel). Sajjad Dolati (Divoon). Nivetha Pethuraj (Anbarasi Manickavel).Sudhanshu Pandey. Suresh Chandra Menon (Arjun K. Maran).J. Mahendran. Bijesh Nagesh (Constable Muthu). Mukesh Tiwari. Prabhakar. Charles Vinoth. Gowthamraj. Athira Patel. Udhayabanu Maheshwaran. Deepa Shankar (Victim’s mother). Vincent Ashokan. Priyadarshini Rajkumar. Kavitha Bharathy. Vignesh Vijayan (Nandhakumar Sub Inspector)

Language Tamil

Producers Hitesh Jhabak. Nemichand Jhabak

Production Jhabak Movies. Nemichand Jhabak
